heroSection.title: Solving mission-critical problems within the Department of Defense.

textSection.mdMain:
### **Who We Are**

DDS was first established by the Secretary of Defense in November 2015 as a SWAT team of nerds that provides the best in modern technical knowledge to bolster national defense.

We are primarily based in the Pentagon and our range of talent includes world-class software developers, engineers, designers, product managers, and digital experts from both the private sector and within government. We also have outposts in Augusta, GA and Mountain View, CA. 

We focus on high-impact projects that advance the Department of Defense's most important initiatives that are critical to the well-being of service members, civilians, and core operations of the Department. 

### **How We Team**

In addition to bringing in private sector and government talent, DDS partners with military services by detailing service members to DDS teams to tackle some of the DoD’s highest priority challenges. 

### [MEET OUR TEAM](https://v2-master--dds-mil.netlify.app/team)
textSection.mdCallout: **Our mission is to provide the best in modern technology to bolster national defense.**

icons.heading: Go where we're needed.
icons.details: Going all-in regardless of location is important. We quickly mobilize our team to go wherever we’re needed.

icons.heading: Do work that matters.
icons.details: We work on high-impact technology projects that help the DoD meet the needs and improve the lives of service members and civilians.

icons.heading: Design side by side with users.
icons.details: Good design is more than just design thinking. It’s designing directly with users to ensure the product and supporting processes meet needs the first time.

icons.heading: Tell the truth, and signal intent.
icons.details: We’re in the business of saving lives. We tell the truth, speak up, and signal intent within the Department.

icons.heading: Hire the best to serve the best.
icons.details: Our people make us unique, and it’s our people who are best positioned to serve the unique needs of DoD.

ctaSection.mdDetails:
**We're focused on hiring the best to serve the best.**

Interested in proving hoodies, hackers, and nerds have an important role to play in furthering national defense missions?
